org/sites/default/files/RIFD/STTP. pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "Short Term Training Program (STTP) in North-Eastern Region (NER) and UTs of J&amp;K and Ladakh intends to conduct faculty trainings through financial assistance from AICTE to enable faculty members in the field of technical education introspect learn techniques that can help prepare students for active and successful participants in a knowledge society. 
<br>

**Duration of Programme:**
It is a residential programme of six days. The approved STTP shall be conducted within six months from the date of release of funds.
